==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=车}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}}: it is derived from a pictogram of a carriage seen from above, with the long vertical stroke representing the axle, the central square representing the body of the carriage, and the top and bottom horizontal lines representing the wheels.

Note that {{och-l|倝}} (as in left part of {{och-l|朝}}) is not derived from {{lang|zh|車}}.

====Usage notes====
* {{zh-l|車}} is a collective term for all types of vehicles with wheel(s). Additional morphemes are added in front to specify the type of the vehicle. For example:
*: {{zh-x|汽車|car}}
*: {{zh-x|火車|train}}
*: {{zh-x|自行車|bicycle}}
*: {{zh-x|嬰兒車|pram}}
